meta.label: Bundle Project and Push to Automation Node
meta.description: Bundle a Dataiku project and migrate it from a Design instance to a remote Automation (or Design) instance.

params.name: previous_bundles
params.label: Previously Used Bundle IDs
params.description: No selection required. Just showing you the previously used Bundle IDs for this project

params.name: bundle_id
params.label: Bundle id
params.description: Unique New Bundle ID (Cannot be one of the above)

params.name: remote_host
params.label: Destination Instance Address
params.description: Specify the location (URL) of the instance to copy the project to. (Required)

params.name: api_key
params.label: Remote API key
params.description: Specify the API key of the destination instance. (Required)

params.name: activate_scenarios
params.label: Activate Scenarios
params.description: If selected, all active scenarios on the initial project will be activated in the remote project.

params.name: ignore_ssl_certs
params.label: Ignore SSL Certificates
params.description: If selected, ignores SSL certificates on remote instance.

params.name: remote_design_instance
params.label: Remote Design Instance
params.description: Are you pushing the project to another design instance?

params.name: create_bundle_on_remote_design_instance
params.label: Create Bundle on Remote Design Instance
params.description: If remote instance is a design instance, create a bundle on it?
